text: Ana hu'negu ama ana kasegene tra kenena kegava nehuta avaririho. E'inama hanageno'a, knare antahi'zane maka'zama antahi ani'hu antahizamo tamagripina eama nehinke'za, ana mopafi vahe'mo'za ana kasegene tra ke'ma nentahi'za neramagesu'za zamagra amanage hugahaze, tamage ama vahera, mareri vaheki'za knare antahi'zane vahe mani'ne'za, maka zamofo antahi ani'hu vahe mani'naze hu'za hugahaze.
